Issue.creator: dabbertorres
Issue.summary: A user identity is intermittently able to be registered more than once
Issue.description: }} This can be confirmed by using psql to check the user's table. One possible reason why this may be happening is due to the users table not having a PRIMARY KEY set, or at least not having UNIQUE set on the id column: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-ca/blob/8c5bc3566495a3aaf566bf90d3f9da631ec46869/lib/dbutil/util.go#L295 Â fabric-ca-server (debug) logs are attached. >
